name: Bingo Carnival
description:
***** Play the most UNIQUE and FUN Bingo game in the world! With lots of SPECIAL ROOMS to play! *****

We bring you the best BINGO game on mobile device with not just ordinary rooms, but with many Special rooms to play with unique winning patterns and special effects!

Tired of not getting Bingo wins with ordinary boost items? Try our Super Power Ups to maximize the boost of getting an advantage of winning other players! To add even more, you can collect special collection items to have your own unique daubers to enhance your bingo play style and more!

*** REAL-TIME Bingo with thousands of other bingo players or your friends!
*** SUPER POWER-UPS like daubing of 4 numbers at once!
*** UPTO 8 CARDS can be played per round for mania!
*** CHANGE CARD during play for getting a better chance to get INSTANT BINGO!
*** COLLECT special items to win bonus and earn extra chips!
*** UNIQUE DAUBERS to choose from when playing with multiple colors!
*** DOZENS of SPECIAL ROOMS to play with unique winning patterns and bonuses!
